item.title: MapVoteX
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Hell this MapVoteLA is crazy or I'm doing something wrong.
Today and I spent a lot of time with another player on our server testing out MapVoteX, BDBMapVote3 and MapVotLA13 with all the same results which I do not agree with!

If there are more than 2 players on the server then all seems ok.
However, with only 2 players, and it even happens in mid game or anywhere in the game, in that if there are only 2 players, and one player makes a vote.
If the second player makes a vote any vote...

MapVoteX

item.title: SmartDM for UT99
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Ok here we are developing again.

The SmartDM103E works fine but the 103G scoreboard has bugs.

I got mixed up with the compiling procedure and buggered everything up.

Latest working beta is 103E

http://www.proasm.com/files/beta/SmartDM103E.zip

item.title: Server Side stuff
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wises)
item.dc:creator: Wises
item.content:encoded:
Redirect still not working

did you add the correct url to your .uz files under RedirectToURL=?
add the '/' to the end?

or somethings not redirected...

also re-test my Asia server as well please as I think i know what the issue was.

rename your cache folder and connect should be quicker then last attempt.

PROASMS|SERVER
ASIA|SERVER ~ SDM-ver 103u - ONLINE

item.title: Release info
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wises)
item.dc:creator: Wises
item.content:encoded:
when we release anything publicly we need to provide at least the following info.
along with ALL associated files. esp since we are making changes to both core/.ini files.

A SmartUnrealPro.txt with install instructs and basic info / contacts etc

perhaps detailed like so ;

================
SmartUnrealPro v1.0a
================
By ProAsm 2013

Installation:
-----------

*upload all files to /system Folder

ServerPackages=SmartUnrealPro
ServerPackages=SmartUnrealproSBv1...
Click to expand...
Release info

item.title: Testing Area
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wises)
item.dc:creator: Wises
item.content:encoded:
http://www.proasm.com/files/ut/beta/sdm.zip

1. Unzip this to your UnrealTournament folder.
2. In your System folder there should now be:

$SmartDM.bat - drag a shortcut to your desktop
SmartDM102.u - needed
SmartDMScoreboard102.u - will get deleted and renewed on every compile.

3. Off your main UT, you will see a folder called SmartDMScoreboard102.
Off that folder are 2 other folders, Classes and Textures
In the textures folder are 2 bmp files, testred and testblue
Those are the...

Testing Area

item.title: UT2Vote History
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
UT2003

UT2Vote12 - Released 23rd Novemeber 2002

As Epic are having a Mutate command back in their patch, I have removed it from UT2Vote12.
So all you need now is the ShowVoteMenu which is normally defaulted to the X key.
For the Admin menu just add the word Admin - ShowVoteMenu Admin.

UT2Vote12 has had all the bugs sorted out, thanks to those Admins that tested it for me.

It now offers several Admin options.

Please read...

UT2Vote History

item.title: UT2Vote58
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
I'm thinking of releasing a UT2Vote58 beta version to the public and let them do the testing etc.
It may also help generate interest.
What do you guys think or should we test it rather ?

Any suggestions, requests, bugs etc... ?

Fixes to date:

1. Fixed UT2Vote image overlapping counter.
2. Fixed 'Unban Player' in Kickmenu.
3. Added BanPlayers option to Semi Admin.
4. Added Silent SpecSpy for Admin (so admin can spy on cheaters)
5. Added so Semi Admin can Pause/UnPause a game.

item.title: UT2Vote59
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
I am getting a lot of reports in 5.8 that ghost maps are appearing in the Top Maps and New Maps menus when these maps are not on the servers.
I know what this is and what causes it as we've had it before.
It is a compiling problem which 'mirrors' the maps in my folder to the 'defaultproperties' so I have had to redo it so we gonna have to release 5.9
Anway I'll get it out this weekend.

item.title: UT3
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Well today I bought the game.... 60 friggin dollars (US)... it better be worth it else I will commit huri kiri
I still dont have a PC that can run it as it plays 10 times worse than the demo, even on 640x480 it sucks very bad.
I think people had forgotten what a horrible experience it is to install it and set it up as it never remembers anything and who ever at Epic made the decision to install everything in the 'Program Files folder' and 'Documents and Settings\Username\My...

UT3

item.title: Rotating weps at pickup bases and lockers
item.author: invalid@example.com (CVROY)
item.dc:creator: CVROY
item.content:encoded:
I'd like to swap numerous weapons at on pickup bases and lockers rotating every 30 seconds. ie: have stinger, bio rifle and flak spawn at the same pickup base, but change every 30 seconds.

ProAsm, is this possible at pickup bases only or could weapon lockers rotate weps as well?

item.title: ChatBots
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Ok this is basically a ServerBots conversion for UT but the ServerBot section has been left out so the normal Bots are used.
The only thing thats still here is the Game Auto Start.
Otherwise the rest of the mod is about the chatting of the bots, basically El Muertes Bullsh*t modification as it was in ServerBots2
Theoretically you dont need a ServerPackage= as it is serverside mod but I see in UT3 the mod get pushed to the client whether you add a ServerPackage or not, another stupid bug...

ChatBots

item.title: UT2Vote problems
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
Socke, Big_Deal, somebody... help

Hi,
ich habe ein Problem mit UT2Vote:
Wenn ich über LAN mit meinem PC und meinem Laptop auf einem UT2-Vote Server, der auf meinem PC läuft, spiele, so kann ich nicht ordentlich voten.
Wenn ich zuerst mit PC vote und dann mit Laptop, so wird der Vote von meinem PC in den Vote von meinem Laptop geändert.
Also kann UT2 Vote anscheinend die beiden Spieler, obwohl sie verschiedene IP Adressen haben nicht unterscheiden.
Mich würde interessieren wie UT2...

UT2Vote problems

item.title: Forum screwed
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProAsm)
item.dc:creator: ProAsm
item.content:encoded:
This forum is all screwed up and has been backdated 20 odd months.

I must say I've just noticed this as all our Sticky's in the General Discussions has gone, especially the ServerBots releases, Zound and UT2Vote55, 56 and 57 releases.
All that is there now is UT2Vote52 from February 2006.
This is bad bad news especially now when we slap in the middle of switching form UT2004 to UT3.

I was wondering why Socke replied to a UT2Vote53 thread a while ago.
I've also been getting all sorts of...

Forum screwed

item.title: Ey guys
item.author: invalid@example.com (utw-Mephisto)
item.dc:creator: utw-Mephisto
item.content:encoded:
I wasn't online for ages, but now I am active again.
A lot has changed.. I moved from Gibraltar to the UK and now I am actually working for Titan. Went from player, to forum admin, to server admin, to employee ....

I just hoped that the UT2Vote community is still active - or even pushing for a UT3 release

Is it official dead ? Ben ?
